Articles.Content:
Hello there everyone.

I love the game.. Greeeatt worrk!!

I've been playing for a few weeks now. Since .8.5 release i think

So I don't really need any help. Just one question.. when's that moon coming ?

I sent everything into space..

from small 2 stage Rockets, to giant towers.

In fact My three Kerbanauts are in orbit as we speak..Jeb's high as usual.. Bill and Bob know that

there isn't enough fuel to get home lol...

anyway just wanted to say hi

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt'n Skunky
